title: Restore previous session loses information about which virtual desktop it was in before closing
content: Firefox's "restore previous session" feature on windows 11 automatically populates the windows back into the virtual desktops they were in on startup. This behavior seems to be absent or broken on firefox in KDE Plasma DE.
creator: xyzinfinitasium

title: Printing issue
content:
I want to print a PDF with a document size of about 4x2cm. When I choose "Default" Margins, the document is printed in the correct size, but without any margins. When I choose "Minimum" Margins, the document is printed with acceptable margins (12mm left, 4mm top), but the document is only printed in about 50% (or even less) size. Scale is set to 100 each (assuming those are percent) This is also visible in the print preview.

For the second printer, same issue (at least on print preview, didn't actually print) No issue (in print preview) when selecting "Microsoft Print to PDF" When choosing "OneNote (Desktop)" printer, the image is even smaller.

Tested around with custom margins a bit and it handles even worse. With my primary printer with 0.5 inches (defaults?) set, the size is ok but no margins are applied. Headers and footers are not shown (so the checkbox is checked - for some unknown reason) - Changing top margin to 0.49 or 0.51, the document is not shown, but the headers and footers are. Setting all margins to 0.00, both document and headers and footers are shown, but all overlapping / within the 4x2 document (paper size is set to Letter). Increasing the top margin (all others on 0.00) now makes the document shrink even more (Print preview, I didn't actually print)
creator: reti

title: How do I disable the touch/large context/right click menu when using touch?
content:
How do I disable/make the context/right click menu appear as the normal mouse context/right click menu?

Normal context/right click menu: https://assets-prod.sumo.prod.webservices.mozgcp.net/media/uploads/images/2024-10-17-00-21-14-0f0d7a.png

Touch context/right click menu: https://assets-prod.sumo.prod.webservices.mozgcp.net/media/uploads/images/2024-10-17-00-22-53-f21a61.png

As you can see the touch menu is huge and since I'm a quite nimble touch-user, I don't need it.

I haven't been able to find any solutions when searching. I'm used to editing both about:config and userchrome.css.
creator: ssssaaaa

title: Video Playback Issues on Specific Website with Firefox
content:
Hi there,

I’m encountering a strange issue when using Firefox to access videos on a particular website Patriot PDR. The site itself loads perfectly, but whenever I try to play any embedded videos or media on the page, the video either doesn’t load or remains stuck buffering.

Interestingly, I’ve tested the same website and videos on other browsers like Chrome and Edge, and they work flawlessly. I’ve already tried clearing the cache, disabling hardware acceleration, and running Firefox in Safe Mode, but the problem persists only on Firefox.

Could this be a compatibility issue between Firefox and the way the media is embedded on this specific site? I would appreciate any suggestions to resolve this problem.

Thanks for your help!
creator: its.jacobtaylor55

title: Video Playback Issues on Specific Website with Firefox
content:
Locking this thread, please continue here: [/questions/1469718]
Hi there,

I’m encountering a strange issue when using Firefox to access videos on a particular website, [[Mobile dent repair |https://www.patriotpdraz.com/]]. The site itself loads perfectly, but whenever I try to play any embedded videos or media on the page, the video either doesn’t load or remains stuck buffering.

Interestingly, I’ve tested the same website and videos on other browsers like Chrome and Edge, and they work flawlessly. I’ve already tried clearing the cache, disabling hardware acceleration, and running Firefox in Safe Mode, but the problem persists only on Firefox.

Could this be a compatibility issue between Firefox and the way the media is embedded on this specific site? I would appreciate any suggestions to resolve this problem.

Thanks for your help!

}curl --location --request POST https://api.writer.com/v1/completions \ 

--header "Authorization: Bearer <token>" \ --header "Content-Type: application/json" \

--data-raw '{"model":"palmyra-x-003-instruct","prompt":"Write me an SEO article about...","max_tokens":150,"temperature":0.7,"top_p":0.9,"stop":["."],"best_of":1,"random_seed":42,"stream":false}'https://api.writer.com/v1/completionsimport Writer from 'writer-sdk';

const client = new Writer({ 

 apiKey: process.env['WRITER_API_KEY'], // This is the default and can be omitted

});

async function main() { 

 const completion = await client.completions.create({    model: 'palmyra-x-003-instruct',    prompt: 'Write me an SEO article about...',  }); 
 console.log(completion.choices);

}
